fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Heal someone, Giving them Basic defense.
- Pacify a player, Reducing their attack to None for 2 nights including this one, You will learn their original Attack value. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can only target yourself once.
- Your Heal ability gets upgraded after repeated uses:
 - 1 use - Upgraded to Powerful defense
 - 2 uses - Now gives Roleblock and Redirect immunity.
 - 3 uses - Can Heal a second target, but this Heal is basic and gives no immunity.
 - 4 uses - Second Heal also Gives Powerful defense and Roleblock + Redirect immunity.
- Conversion Immunity.
